line_1: In all her court of revelry: —
line_2: Not one mask'd Sorrow can you see

line_1: Midst fell debate, and maddening revelrie,
line_2: For sober swain so thankless ne'er mought be;

line_1: And thought-beguiling shew, and masking revelry.
